notImplemented: This feature is not yet implemented. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
requestCancelled: The request was cancelled before completion. Please try again if it was important.
internalServerError: The server encountered an internal error. Please try again later or contact support if the problem continues.
notFound: The requested resource was not found. Please check your information and try again.
serviceUnavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
methodNotAllowed: The requested method is not allowed for this resource. Please review your request or contact support.
badRequest: The request contains incorrect or incomplete data. Please review and try again.
unauthorisedRequest: You are not authorized to perform this action. Please log in or check your permissions.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
requestTimeout: The request took too long to respond and was cancelled. Please check your connection and try again.
noInternetConnection: No internet connection detected. Please check your network and try again.
conflict: A conflict was detected with the submitted information. Please review your data and try again.
sendTimeout: The request send timeout expired. Please try again later.
unableToProcess: Unable to process the request. Please review your data or contact support.
defaultError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
formatException: The format of the received data is invalid. Please contact support if the problem continues.
notAcceptable: The server cannot process the request in the sent format. Please review your data and try again.
